settings.text: Unlock the Secrets to Success with Our Exclusive Online Workshop Tailored for Latina Women Entrepreneurs

Are you ready to take your business skills to the next level? Join our exclusive 90-minute online workshop designed specifically for Latina women entrepreneurs in the USA. Whether you're looking to master Canva or uncover the secrets of effective ChatGPT prompt engineering, this workshop is your gateway to enhanced marketing and business acumen. Limited slots available!

settings.heading: ✨ Enhance Your Business Skills with Hands-On Learning

settings.text: In today’s competitive landscape, staying ahead requires more than ambition—it demands expertise. Our workshops are crafted to empower you with practical skills and innovative strategies. Learn how to create eye-catching designs with Canva or discover the best practices for using ChatGPT. With real-time, interactive learning hosted on Zoom, you’ll gain actionable insights that can transform your business.

Imagine the growth possibilities with improved business tools at your disposal. Our workshop promises a transformative experience that enhances your capabilities and boosts your confidence as a powerful entrepreneur. learning new techniques can revolutionize your approach and help you achieve your entrepreneurial dreams.

During BETA, our lowest prices make this an investment you can’t afford to miss.

settings.title: Masterclass Replay Available
settings.description: Buy the replay and get the video and resource material for all classes.

settings.heading: What language is the workshop conducted in?
settings.row_content:
This workshop will be presented in Portuguese language to cater to our target audience of 

Latina women entrepreneurs in the USA.

settings.heading: Who is the workshop designed for?
settings.row_content:
The workshop is specifically designed for Latina women entrepreneurs living in the USA 

who are aiming to enhance their business skills and digital marketing strategies.

settings.heading: What topics will be covered in the workshop?
settings.row_content: The workshop will cover a variety of essential topics, including Canva for creating engaging visuals and mastering ChatGPT prompt engineering, alongside other marketing and business-related subjects to help grow your business.

settings.heading: How long is each workshop session?
settings.row_content: Each workshop is a 90-minute session, packed with valuable insights and practical tools you can immediately apply to your business.

settings.heading: What is the cost of the workshop, and is there any special pricing available?
settings.row_content: The workshop is currently offered at a BETA price of $97, providing significant value over its regular price of $297.

settings.heading: How will the workshops be delivered?
settings.row_content: The workshops are conducted online via Zoom, allowing you to learn from the convenience of your home or office. It is easy to participate no matter where you are located in the USA.
